GAH! Stop arguing and such, opinions are sometimes best kept to oneself.

Dewboy: 
Who's been feeding you lines? Regardless, your ideas are good, but many of them are not suitable for the rpg.

(steels KSL's replying style:)

<DON'T YOU DARE PUT ALL ANIME..... etc.>

What I believe Jer was saying is that he doesn't like Anime in genereal, whether it be Pokemon, Slayers, Sailor Moon, Ninja Scroll, Ghost in the Shell, Gundam, Escaflonase, Outlaw Star, Vampire Hunter, Perfect Blue, Spriggan, you name it. =)

KSL:
No more bashing please...

On the side: Why did you only upgrade from 60megs of RAM (an odd number to begin with) to 128 for 20$? You should look into getting 256 DDR, i dont' know american prices, but it's about 70$ canadian right now. Watchout though, RAM prices are rising again... (or the were last time i checked).

LegendaryNemasis:
Keep your thougts to yourself... at least when they are negative.
